medical_history.chief_complaint: 2 day history of lower abdominal pain, sharp and unable to walk.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior to presentation. The pain is sharp and was severe enough to prevent ambulation. The patient also reports chills but no fevers. Diarrhea occurred but there was no blood in stools.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV with undetectable viral load, diverticulosis, nephrolithiasis status post lithotripsy, anal papilloma/warts, LSIL and AIN status post biopsy.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of colon cancer, mother has diverticulosis.
